text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Okay, Air Groove! It's time for you<n>and me to do our best
dancin'!<n>Hoooold! And lift!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Perfect! Then, I'll cast confetti into the<n>air, and it will fall like
snowflakes of<n>gold and silver! A deep and moving<n>
performance this will be!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Hey, let's calm down a little! That<n>concert has gotten you
both way too<n>excited!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Heh. Well, I can say with much joy<n>and confidence, their
sustained<n>excitement is a clear result of how<n>meaningful
the commemorative<n>concert was.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I received lots of messages<n>from the folks back home
saying they<n>were all happy to see it, even though<n>they
couldn't attend in person.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
So, I think we should eat a lot to<n>celebrate how successful
the event<n>was at making everyone happy.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Ha...hahaha, that's right! Ah, but, I<n>would appreciate it if you
practiced a<n>bit of restraint in your celebration.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Hey.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's Brian. ♪ What did you think of<n>the concert? Which of
my songs<n>touched your heart?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Maybe "Endless Dream!!"? Your<n>song "BLAZE" was
pretty—

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
No. Listen, eat some more meat. You<n>won't grow any
muscle if you only<n>eat sweets.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Typical Brian! We're supposed to be<n>having fun, you know!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
And? Concerts and parties are<n>rewards for running. If you
wanna<n>attend another, you'd better be fit to<n>fight for it.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Now then, I want to express my<n>thanks to you both for your
hard work<n>in preparing the commemorative<n>concert and
today's after-party.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I hate to interrupt, President.<n>However, I received notice
from a<n>track attendant saying they spotted<n>students out
running while they were<n>supposed to be at the party.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I also see your name here, Brian.Care to enlighten me as to why?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Hmph.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha! No, no, it's all right. I had<n>considered warning the
students not<n>to get too swept up in the party mood,<n>but
there was no need.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The fall G1 season will begin<n>soon—and it seems everyone
is<n>preparing to forge their futures.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The curtain has fallen on the radiant<n>stage, and the sound of
cheers has<n>settled down. Soon, the gate to<n>another
heart-stopping race will open!
